title: [Large-Scale] Integrated Academic English Education in Science Disciplines within Technology-Mediated Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational academic English proficiency and experience in secondary science education
context.additional_context: A course for in-service secondary science teachers, targeting the improvement of academic English proficiency in the science field within a blended learning environment utilizing digital devices.

learning_goals: Independently analyze and summarize at least three scientific papers by combining flipped/blended learning models with face-to-face instruction
Accurately pronounce and use at least 50 specialized terms in the science field during academic presentations and discussions
Collaboratively produce at least five academic materials with fellow teachers using digital collaboration tools (e.g., Google Classroom)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
